Latest Freegal music downloads

May 20, 2014 • Leon Paternoster

Freegal is our free, legal MP3 downloading and streaming service. You’ll just need your library card number and PIN to use it.

Here’s our pick of the best newly available downloads:

Rock

  • Foo Fighters: Greatest hits
  • Kings of Leon: Mechanical bull

Pop

  • Paloma Faith: Can’t rely on you
  • Katy B: Crying for no reason

Easy listening

  • Barry Manilow: Ultimate Manilow
  • George Michael: Songs from the last century

Dance

  • Frankie Knuckles: Best of Frankie Knuckles
  • Various: UKF Bass Culture 2

R&B

  • Pitbull feat. Ke$ha: Timber
  • Kid Ink: My own lane

Classical

  • The Piano Guys: Story of my life
  • Hilary Hahn: Stravinsky/Brahms: Violin concertos LP
